price: ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߖߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ ߟߋ߬ ߕߌߢߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߬ߣߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߴߏ ߞߊ߬ߟߊߡߊ߬
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
